recordWizard-desc: ilo la sina ken pana e kalama toki e luka toki tawa lipu.
mwe-recwiz-prevent-close: sina weka tan lipu. kalama li awen ala la ona li weka. sina wile ala wile weka?
mwe-recwiz-publish: o pana tawa ilo Wikimedia Commons
mwe-recwiz-tutorial-help:
==== seme la mi ni? ====
# sina ken la o luka e nena "o open e alasa".
# o kalama e nimi. ona li ken nimi "suno".
# o kute e kalama sina. o pona e ona.
# o pona e sona ilo.
# ale li pona la o awen kalama!
mwe-recwiz-tutorial-info: sina wile sona e ni: seme la mi pona e ilo mi? o lukin e [[Special:MyLanguage/Help:Configure_your_microphone|lipu ni]].
mwe-recwiz-tutorial-mictester-info: ale li pona la o luka e nena o open e kalama
mwe-recwiz-speaker-warning: sona ni li len ala. jan ale li ken lukin e ni.
mwe-recwiz-speaker-licensecontent: mi $1 li pana e ken pi kalama mi tawa ni:
mwe-recwiz-speaker-agreement: sina sona e ni: kalama sina li ken lon lipu mute Wikimesija lon lipu Wikipesija lon lipu Wiktionary lon lipu Wikidata.
mwe-recwiz-details-help: nimi tu li sitelen sama la o pana e sona namako sama ni: live (verb, to live) vs. live (adj, broadcasting in real time)
mwe-recwiz-details-addwords: o pana e nimi o luka e nena <Enter>. ante la o pana e nimi mute la o selo e ona kepeken sitelen #
mwe-recwiz-details-deduplicate: o weka e nimi pi kalama sina
mwe-recwiz-details-inspiration: sina sona ala sona e nimi wile?
mwe-recwiz-details-generators: o alasa e nimi lon nasin ni
mwe-recwiz-studio-info-audio: o luka e $1 la o kalama e nimi
mwe-recwiz-studio-info-video: o luka e $1 la o luka e nimi
mwe-recwiz-videostudio-webcamaccess: o ken e ni: ilo Lingua Libre li lukin e sina.
mwe-recwiz-videostudio-clicktostart: sina wile open la o luka e nena.
mwe-recwiz-videostudio-willstart: o toki e nimi "$1" lon tenpo ni:
mwe-recwiz-publish-areyousure: sina wile ala wile weka e ni?
mwe-recwiz-publish-commonsfilelist: o lukin e pana sina lon lipu Wikimedia Commons
mwe-recwiz-shortcuts-toggle-recording: o open o pini e kalama
mwe-recwiz-error-mediastream-notallowed: sina ken ala e kepeken pi ilo kalama. sina wile pana e kalama la o ken e ni. ni la o luka e nena ni.
mwe-recwiz-error-mediastream-notfound: ilo ala li lon. sina wile awen la o pana e ona tawa ilo sina.
mwe-recwiz-error-mediastream-technical: pakala li lon tan kon ilo sina. mi ken ala kepeken ilo kalama. o open sin e lipu ni. sona pakala: $1
mwe-recwiz-error-mediastream-unknow: pakala nasa li lon tan kon ilo sina. o open sin e lipu ni.
mwe-recwiz-error-noname: o pana e nimi tawa sijelo jan.
mwe-recwiz-error-duplicatename: sijelo ante li nimi $1. sijelo ale o nimi ante.
mwe-recwiz-error-nolanguages: sina sona e toki wan a ;)
mwe-recwiz-error-network: mi ken ala toki tawa ilo suli. o lukin e kon wawa ilo. o alasa sin.
mwe-recwiz-warning-wordsleft: nimi li awen lon. sina wile ala wile pini?
mwe-recwiz-warning-pendinguploads: mi pana ala e kalama ale. sina wile ala wile pana e ona?
mwe-recwiz-warning-faileduploads: mi pana ala e kalama ale tan pakala kon. sina wile ala wile weka e ona?
mwe-recwiz-nearby-limit-help: nanpa 1 en nanpa 500 la nanpa o lon insa ni
mwe-recwiz-nearby-deduplicate: o weka e nimi pi kalama lon
mwe-recwiz-error-cantgetposition: mi ken ala sona e ma sina. o pana e nanpa ma sina ($1).
mwe-recwiz-warning-noresults: ijo ala li lon poka ma ni.
mwe-recwiz-list-deduplicate: o weka e nimi pi kalama lon
mwe-recwiz-wmcategory-title-help: nimi kulupu. o pana kin e namako nimi kulupu
mwe-recwiz-wmcategory-deduplicate: o weka e nimi pi kalama lon
mwe-recwiz-wmcategory-limit-help: nanpa 1 en nanpa 2000 la nanpa o lon insa ni
mwe-recwiz-list-error-nopage: o pana e nimi pi lipu kulupu
mwe-recwiz-error-nowiki: toki sina la kulupu Wikipesija en kulupu Wiktionary li lon ala.
